// src/components/About.js import React, { useEffect } from 'react'; import './About.css'; import aboutGif from '../assets/4.gif'; // Make sure this path is correct const About = () => { useEffect(() => { document.documentElement.style.setProperty('--about-bg', `url(${aboutGif})`); }, []); return (

About Me

My Journey in IT

I'm Ronald (Kiptulwo) Kimutai, a passionate and results-driven Bachelor of Science in Information Technology student at KCA University. I'm deeply enthusiastic about technology, with a strong focus on software development, systems analysis, and innovative IT solutions that solve real-world challenges.

My academic background and hands-on experience have equipped me with a solid understanding of programming, databases, networks, and system design principles. I am skilled in various technologies and development tools, and I continuously seek to expand my knowledge in both emerging and established areas of IT.

I am a proactive learner, a problem solver by nature, and a strong believer in continuous improvement. Whether working independently or as part of a collaborative team, I value professionalism, integrity, and efficiency in every task I undertake.

My Skills

JavaScript/React
HTML/CSS
Node.js
Database Management
); }; export default About;
